## Matrix4.fromUniformScale() method

Computes a Matrix4 instance representing a uniform scale.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static fromUniformScale(scale: number, result?: Matrix4): Matrix4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | number | The uniform scale factor. |
|  result | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | _(Optional)_ The object in which the result will be stored, if undefined a new instance will be created. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md)

The modified result parameter, or a new Matrix4 instance if one was not provided.
